snippet: After the technical team for “Spider-Man: Turn Off the Dark” determined that the onstage injury Daniel Curry, a dancer, suffered in Thursday night’s show was not caused by a computer malfunction, the company resumed performances on Friday.
abstract: Spokesman for Broadway musical Spider-Man: Turn Off the Dark says accident in which ensemble dancer and understudy Daniel Curry was injured was caused by human error rather than equipment malfunction and that performances will resume as scheduled.
lead_paragraph: After the technical team for “Spider-Man: Turn Off the Dark” determined that the onstage injury Daniel Curry, a dancer, suffered in Thursday night’s show was not caused by a computer malfunction, the company resumed performances on Friday.
